description: This is a market on whether Uniswap v3 will be live on Optimism mainnet by June 15, 2021, 12:00 PM ET. This market will resolve to “Yes” if Uniswap v3 is live on Optimism by the resolution date, and “No” otherwise. If the resolution criteria are satisfied prior to that date, this market will resolve immediately. “Live” in this context can be defined as being deployed and usable on Optimism and publicly announced via the official Uniswap Twitter and/or blog. V3 can be defined as Uniswap v3.0.0 or greater. This market will resolve when Uniswap v3 is deployed on the mainnet of Optimism, with or without some bridging mechanism from Ethereum mainnet. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, this market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
